title: Had to quit game because of a tornado.
body: > I had to quit a game in the beginning because there was a warning of a tornado in Orlando, FL, near on where I live. When I came back on, I had leavebuster. Please Rito remove it. OP. 9/1/2016{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: Oh no, I hope all is well for you!  I know the leaving might sometimes be beyond your control, but it doesn't apply onto an account unless it's more than one leave.  These leaves are also treated equally because they cause others a negative experience.  Best thing you can do is stay safe, then play when you know there won't be any interruptions.  Take care!
The thing is, I chose never to quit again but what happened happened, how am I suppose not to quit? If there was no tornado, there was no quit, no leave buster!

Hello, LB is never removed. If you reached a low priority queue, it means you missed several games before that tornado warning. If you don't go AFK anymore, you don't have to worry about Leaver Buster anymore.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714
